alert.note: Alert for Allen; Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 23 at 8:59PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Kinder Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau ...The Flood Watch is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Oberlin For the Calcasieu River...including Glenmora, Oakdale, Oberlin, Kinder, White Oak Park, Salt Water Barrier...flooding is possible. For the Bayou Nezpique...including Basile...flooding is possible. For the Mermentau River...including Mermentau...flooding is possible. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1000 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Bayou Nezpique near Basile. * WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Minor agricultural flood damage will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 2.6 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Bayou Nezpique Basile 22.0 2.6 Tue 8 pm CST 10.3 19.2 21.5 &&
